statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection;
SELECT product_id, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection;
SELECT inspection_date, inspection_result FROM quality_control_inspection;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspection_result = TRUE;
SELECT inspector_name, product_id FROM quality_control_inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT product_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' AND inspection_result = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection
SELECT product_name, inspection_date FROM quality_control_inspection
SELECT inspector_name, defect_count FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE defect_count > 0
SELECT * FROM inspection_reports
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_content FROM inspection_reports
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE defect_count > 5 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT product_name, inspector_name, defect_count FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspector_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY defect_count ASC
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE product_name = 'Product X' AND inspection_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM quality_control_inspection GROUP BY inspector_name ORDER BY total_inspections DESC
SELECT qc.*, ir.report_content FROM quality_control_inspection qc JOIN inspection_reports ir ON qc.id = ir.inspection_id
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM QualityControlInspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM Products WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InspectionReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM QualityControlInspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC, inspector_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT p.product_name, i.inspection_date, i.inspection_result FROM Products p JOIN QualityControlInspections i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE p.manufacturer_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT i.inspection_id, r.report_date, r.report_details FROM QualityControlInspections i LEFT JOIN InspectionReports r ON i.inspection_id = r.inspection_id WHERE r.report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM Products p JOIN QualityControlInspections i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name ORDER BY total_inspections DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, i.inspection_date, r.report_details FROM Products p JOIN QualityControlInspections i ON p.product_id = i.product_id LEFT JOIN InspectionReports r ON i.inspection_id = r.inspection_id WHERE i.inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY i.inspection_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_result = TRUE;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspectors WHERE specialization = 'Electronics';
SELECT report_text FROM inspection_reports WHERE is_approved = FALSE ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_result = TRUE ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, description FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT inspector_name, specialization, email FROM inspectors WHERE specialization = 'Electronics';

SELECT ir.report_id, ir.report_date, ir.report_text, qc.inspector_name FROM inspection_reports ir INNER JOIN quality_control_inspections qc ON ir.inspection_id = qc.inspection_id WHERE ir.is_approved = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT inspector_id, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_id, product_id, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT inspector_id, count(*) AS total_inspections FROM inspections GROUP BY inspector_id HAVING count(*) > 5;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT inspector_id, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM inspections GROUP BY inspector_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_inspections DESC;

SELECT products.product_name, inspections.inspection_date, inspectors.name FROM products JOIN inspections ON products.product_id = inspections.product_id JOIN inspectors ON inspections.inspector_id = inspectors.inspector_id WHERE products.category = 'Sanitary' ORDER BY inspections.inspection_date ASC;

SELECT reports.report_date, reports.report_text, inspectors.name AS inspector_name FROM reports JOIN inspectors ON reports.inspector_id = inspectors.inspector_id WHERE reports.report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY reports.report_date DESC;

SELECT analysis.findings, reports.report_date, inspectors.name, products.product_name FROM analysis JOIN reports ON analysis.report_id = reports.report_id JOIN inspectors ON reports.inspector_id = inspectors.inspector_id JOIN products ON reports.inspection_id = products.product_id WHERE analysis_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC, reports.report_date DESC;
